spl_product_data_elements: Sanar Naturals Gentian Violet Gentian Violet ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL WATER GENTIAN VIOLET GENTIAN VIOLET CATION
active_ingredient: Active ingredient Gentian Violet 0.1% Purpose First Aid Antiseptic
indications_and_usage: Uses For external treatment of abrasions and minor cuts.
warnings: Warnings For external treatment of abrasions and minor cuts Do not Do not apply to an ulcerative lesions as this may cause tattooing of the skin. Do not use in eyes Stop use and ask a doctor if redness, irritation, swelling, or pain persists or increases or if infection occurs. Keep out of reach of children. In case of ingestion, seek medical help or contact Poison Control Center immediately.
ask_doctor: Do not Do not apply to an ulcerative lesions as this may cause tattooing of the skin. Do not use in eyes
stop_use: Stop use and ask a doctor if redness, irritation, swelling, or pain persists or increases or if infection occurs.
keep_out_of_reach_of_children: Keep out of reach of children. In case of ingestion, seek medical help or contact Poison Control Center immediately.
dosage_and_administration: Directions Clean the affected area and apply directly to the wound or use a cotton applicator once or twice daily. Do not bandage.
other_safety_information: Other Information Will stain skin or clothing

spl_product_data_elements: Gentian Violet Gentian Violet WATER ALCOHOL GENTIAN VIOLET GENTIAN VIOLET CATION
active_ingredient: Drug Facts Drug Facts Active Ingredient: Purpose Gentain Violet 1%........First Aid Antiseptic
purpose: Purpose Uses: First Aid to help prevent infection in minor cuts, scrapes, and burns.
warnings: Warnings Warnings For External Use Only. Flammable: Keep away from fire or flame.
do_not_use: Do Not Use: Do not use: In the eyes or apply over large areas of the body. In case of deep or punture wounds, animal bites, or serious burns, consult a doctor. Lomger than 1 week unless directed by a doctor. Do not apply to an ulcerative lesion as this may cause tattooing on the skin.
stop_use: Stop Use Stop use and ask a doctor if the condition persists or gets worse.
pregnancy_or_breast_feeding: If Pregnant or Breast Feeding If pregnant or breast-feeding, ask a health professional before use.
keep_out_of_reach_of_children: Keep out of reach of children Keep out of reach of children
overdosage: Overdose In case of overdose, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
indications_and_usage: Directions Directions Clean the affected area. Apply a small amount of this product on the area 1 to 3 times daily. Supervise children in the use of this product.
other_safety_information: Other Information Store at controlled room temperature: 15 -30C (56-86F) Tamper Evident Feature: Do not use if cello-band over cap is torn, broken or missing. Close tightly after use. Product may stain skin and clothing.
inactive_ingredient: Inactive Ingredient Inactive Ingredients: Alcohol, Purified Water
dosage_and_administration: Directions Directions Clean the affected area. Apply a small amount of this product on the area 1 to 3 times daily. Supervise children in the use of this product.

spl_product_data_elements: Gentian Violet 2% gentian violet 2% ALCOHOL WATER GENTIAN VIOLET GENTIAN VIOLET CATION
indications_and_usage: Purpose First aid antiseptic to help protect against skin infection in minor cuts, scrapes or burns
do_not_use: Do not use in eyes; with bandages; on large areas of the body; longer than one week unless directed by a doctor; stop use and consult a doctor if condition persists; in case of deep puncture wounds, animal bites or serious burns, consult a doctor; if known to be sensitive to any ingredients in the product; do not apply to ulcerative lesions as this may result in tattooing of the skin.
stop_use: Stop use and ask a doctor or pharmacist if skin irritation or sensitivity develops or increases or if the condition persists or gets worse.
keep_out_of_reach_of_children: KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. In case of accidental ingestion, seek medical help or contact a Poison Control Center immediately.
dosage_and_administration: Directions Clean the affected area. Apply a small amount using a cotton-tipped applicator one to three times daily. Do not bandage.
other_safety_information: Other Information Store at controlled room temperature. Will stain skin and clothing.
questions: Questions or Suggestions? 1.855.763.8733 or visit us at www.thepodiatreecompany.com

warnings: Warnings For external use only Ask a doctor before use. if you have deep or puncture wounds, animal bites or serious burns. When using this product. do not use in eyes or apply over large areas of the body. do not use longer than 1 week unless directed by a doctor. indications_and_usage: Uses First aid to help prevent infection in minor: cuts scrapes burns insect bites
warnings: Warnings For external use only Consult a doctor before use if you have deep or puncture wounds animal bites serious burns When using this product do not use in or near the eyes or over large areas of the body do not apply to an ulcerative lesion as this may result in tattooing of the skin Stop use and consult a doctor if redness, irritation, swelling or pain persists or increases, or if infection or rash occurs symptoms persist for more than 7 days, or clear up and occur again within a few days KEEP OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center immediately.
ask_doctor: Consult a doctor before use if you have deep or puncture wounds animal bites serious burns
when_using: When using this product do not use in or near the eyes or over large areas of the body do not apply to an ulcerative lesion as this may result in tattooing of the skin
stop_use: Stop use and consult a doctor if redness, irritation, swelling or pain persists or increases, or if infection or rash occurs symptoms persist for more than 7 days, or clear up and occur again within a few days
keep_out_of_reach_of_children: KEEP OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center immediately.
dosage_and_administration: Directions clean the affected area apply a small amount of this product to the area using the enclosed applicator or a cotton-tipped applicator 1 to 2 times daily do not bandage
